snippet: Dr. Martin Salia, who died on Monday of Ebola, was two weeks into his illness and presented a steep challenge for treatment.
abstract: Dr Martin Salia, Ebola patient who arrived from Sierra Leone in extremely critical condition, dies at Nebraska Medical Center in Omaha; advanced stage of his illness presented challenge too great to overcome.

byline.original: By ABBY GOODNOUGH and TOMMY TRENCHARD
byline.contributor: Abby Goodnough reported from Washington, and Tommy Trenchard from Freeport, Sierra Leone.

lead_paragraph: Dr. Martin Salia, who died on Monday of Ebola, was two weeks into his illness and presented a steep challenge for treatment.

headline.main: Doctor Being Treated for Ebola in Omaha Dies
headline.print_headline: Ebola Patient Dies in Nebraska; Was in Advanced Stage
